params._data: information to be interpreted by L2
params._tokenId: index of token for the provided ERC721 contract

returns._0: hash of input generated by deposit

erc721Withdrawal(bytes).details: can only be called by the Rollups contract

erc721Deposit(address,uint256,bytes).notice: deposit an ERC721 token in the portal and create a token in L2

erc721Withdrawal(bytes).notice: withdraw an ERC721 token from the portal

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Handle the receipt of an NFT
